how to transfer money: To transfer money, navigate to your account dashboard, select 'Transfer Funds,' enter the recipient's account details, and confirm the transaction.
how to schedule a payment: To schedule a payment, go to the 'Scheduled Payments' section, choose the payment type, set the frequency and number of occurrences, and save.
how to reset my password: To reset your password, click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page, enter your email address, and follow the instructions sent to your inbox.
how to check my balance: To check your balance, log in to your account dashboard where your current balance and recent transactions are displayed.

how to view and download my statement: To view your statement, navigate to 'Account Statements' where you can see recent statements and download a PDF version if needed.
